title: Service Learning Workshop for Public Administration and Democratic Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of public administration systems and fundamental principles of democracy
context.additional_context: Practical education combining theory and field application for current professionals

learning_goals: Propose at least three practical strategies for implementing democracy in public administration contexts.
Design and apply service-learning projects to address community issues.
Analyze the interconnection between public interest and administrative processes for community development.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
